Author: miralab
Title: 🔥[ANN] MIRA 🔥 - Cryptocurrencies have never been so easy
Body: Mira includes the features of both exchanges and wallets, the main difference is that we offer a solution for storing and sending cryptocurrencies off chain. This is like the difference between online payments and cash. The money packed in MiraBox can be downloaded to a usb drive, or sent via email or messenger without any commissions and transaction records. Mira doesn’t store user passwords and identities; there’s no need to create and account or a wallet for buying or selling a MiraBox. These are new levels of security and anonymity, compared to the existing solutions.

Author: miralab
Title: 🔥[ANN] MIRA 🔥 - Cryptocurrencies have never been so easy
Body: If you are talking about the increased pump&dump cases then we can’t give any guarantee. Nor can anyone, since cryptocurrencies are an asset on an unregulated exchange. If someone says they can guarantee anything they are lying. But we can reduce the risk of pump&dump to a minimum with the market-making mechanism. We have two reserve funds (see WP): in MIRA token and in cryptocurrency or fiat money, which is about $ 2.0 million and $ 1.2 million, respectively (provided we reach a hard cap). In the future, reserve funds will be used for the MIRA platform. Before we launch it there is no utility demand for tokens and the tokens themselves are relatively illiquid. At this point we will use reserve funds to support the spread of bilateral quotations by the market maker. The market maker will have a rather large resource, which will help to prevent pump&dump schemes.

Title: 🔥[ANN] MIRA 🔥 - Cryptocurrencies have never been so easy
Body: There is no fixed income for Mira token holders. However, we expect that by 2020 the  price of our tokens will see a 35% increase, and from 2021 it will reach 45% due to token burning and having part of the revenue in fiat money. Apart from that, Mira token owners are granted the right to perform services for the platform and get income in MIRA: 10% of the Mira income for becoming a node, 50% of the SmartBox fee for smart contract development, and 2% of the value of the disputed assets for becoming an arbitrator. You can read a detailed description in chapters ECONOMY OF MIRA and THREE REASONS TO PARTICIPATE IN THE MIRA TOKEN ICO of our White Paper https://miralab.io/Mira_WhitePaper_EN.pdf. Thanks!

Author: miralab
Title: 🔥[ANN] MIRA 🔥 - Cryptocurrencies have never been so easy
Body: Thank you so much!  The overall commission, when dealing with MiraBoxes, includes: commission on a current exchange rate + Stock Commission and Commission for transferring cryptocurrency + Mira Commission. Mira’s commissions: NominalBox with a preset amount of cryptocurrency - 0.05% of the transaction amount (paid in fiat). MultiBox with different currencies and optionally a file - 0.3% of the transaction amount (paid in MIRA). SmartBox with a smart contract condition for opening - 1.50% of the transaction amount (paid in MIRA).
